Men's Glove Size Conversion Chart

Find the perfect fit for your hands with our glove size conversion chart. This guide helps you convert between S-XXL sizes and numerical measurements, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit for any occasion.

Size Hand Circumference (inches)
S 7.5-8
M 8.5-9
L 9.5-10
XL 10.5-11
XXL 11.5-12

How to Measure Your Hand for Gloves

  1. Measure around your dominant hand at the widest part (usually just below the knuckles, excluding the thumb).
  2. Make sure the tape measure is snug but not tight.
  3. Record the measurement in inches or centimeters.
  4. Use the chart above to find your corresponding glove size.

Tip: If you're between sizes, it's usually best to choose the larger size for a more comfortable fit.
